com.yantra.api.omp.payment

Interface voidInvoice

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    com.yantra.api.OMPApi, YIFApi

    public interface voidInvoice

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.w3c.dom.Document voidInvoice(YFSEnvironment env, org.w3c.dom.Document inXML)
      The voidInvoice() API rolls back an invoice.

    • Method Detail

      • voidInvoice

        org.w3c.dom.Document voidInvoice(YFSEnvironment env,
                                 org.w3c.dom.Document inXML)
                          throws com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSException,
                                 java.rmi.RemoteException
        The voidInvoice() API rolls back an invoice.

        If the invoice is for a shipment and that shipment has multiple invoices associated with it all the invoices of that shipment will be voided.

        If the invoice has a positive DistributedAmount that amount will be removed and applied to one or more charge requests. The invoice's InvoiceCollectionDetails will be updated accordingly.

        After having been voided the invoice will be of status '02'.

        The charge transaction for the shipment or order invoice will remain as it was but will become of status 'VOIDED'. That status will be ignored when calculating totals for that order's charge transactions. It will also not be considered by the requestCollection API for distribution of charges or the creation of authorization or charge requests.

        If IgnoreStatusCheck is set to Y, Order Invoices may be voided without adding the transaction to the pipeline.


        Related Documents
        Input XML Input DTD Error XML Error DTD

        User Exits:
        Depending on modifications taking place, the voidInvoice API may call certain user exits.
        Any quantity change may invoke following user exits:
        com.yantra.yfs.japi.ue.YFSRecalculateHeaderTaxUE
        com.yantra.yfs.japi.ue.YFSRecalculateLineTaxUE
        com.yantra.yfs.japi.ue.YFSOrderRepricingUE

        Events Raised:

          VOID_INVOICE.ON_VOID_INVOICE: This event is raised for each invoice that is voided after all invoices are processed. For more information, see the associated XML, DTD and Key data files.

            Template Support:
            Yes.

          Audits: None

          Pre-conditions:
          The invoice cannot have been published to an external system. Only un-published invoice (status = 00) can be voided. If payment rule is AT_CREATE, then invoice status is not checked and invoice cannot be voided regardless of status.

          The no adjustments can have been made to any invoiced line or to the headers.

          The invoice to be voided cannot be for a return order associated with exchange order. The associated exchange order has to be cancelled for voiding the return order invoice.

          Adjustment invoice which is created by the system due to price change cannot be voided. Manually created SalesOrder adjustment invoice can be voided.

          Post-conditions: The invoice will be removed and the effects of creating it will have been reversed.

          Output Template Support: Yes

          Database Extensibility Support: Yes

        Parameters:
        env - Required. Environment handle returned by the createEnvironment API.
        inXML - Required. For more information, see the associated input xml files.

        Returns:
        An xml document containing the details of the processed Order. For details on the output, refer to the associated output files.

        Throws:
        YFSException - Yantra exception containing error codes in the standard error files.
        RemoteException - Java's default remote exception handler.
        com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSException
        java.rmi.RemoteException
